title: :nth-last-child(n)
description: The `:nth-last-child(n)` CSS pseudo-class selects elements based on their position among sibling elements, counting from the last child to the first.
content: The pseudo-class that selects elements based on their position from the end of their parentâ€™s child list. It works similarly to `:nth-child(n)`, but counts from the last child to the first, enabling to target elements relative to the end of the list.
